mapper.insert: insert into hotplaces (id, title, img, description, place_name, latitude, longitude, like_count, user_id) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{img}, #{description}, #{placeName}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: select id, title, img, description, place_name, latitude, longitude, like_count from hotplaces
select h.id, h.title, h.img, h.description, h.place_name, h.latitude, h.longitude, h.like_count, h.user_id, u.user_id, u.nickname from hotplaces h, user u where id = #{id} and h.user_id = u.id
